If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me

SCP-3287 changes locations every day exactly at 12:00 AM, if not under watch by a guard on said time, the Locker will mysteriously disappear, teleporting to a random school somewhere in the world, it is highly dangerous if the SCP Escapes containment, as public will notice the SCP, Along with the Foundation MTF Forces moving to contain the Subject. SCP-3287 is currently in Site-[REDACTED], inside an abandoned middle school, Second floor, right beside class [REDACTED]. All personnel are required to have Level 3 access card in order to perform test on the SCP...   Logs: Log-3287-1:  Dr. Brenta: "How are you feeling, Mister Ryu?" Mr. Ryu: "I'm... I'm fine, ma'am." Dr. Brenta: "Can you describe your contact with the Subject?" Mr. Ryu: "I... It was... strange. I opened the locker and... And a guy just says "You sure have found me." And grabbed me... And then.." Dr. Brenta: "It's alright, Ryu. You don't have to say it if you feel uncomfortable." Mr. Ryu: "He did stuff to me..." [Log ended]

SCP-3287:"Mysterious Locker". Subject class: Euclid. Special Containment Procedures: The subject must be under strictly 24/7 watch from two different site guards, no special containment room required. Description: The SCP Subject is described to have an appearance of a normal white locker, when a living being is near, the locker begins to shake violently as if something wants to escape its containment. If any personnel opens the locker, SCP-3287-A, a humanoid individual who's described as a big, fat man in his 40's, will jump out, grab the said personnel, and violently rape the victim, no matter what race or sex the personnel is. Contacts with 3287-A has been confirmed to cause mind breaking experiences, paralyze with high possibility to make the victim fall in a coma for the next few days. SCP-3287-A Will not suffer any physical damage or pain, and will not stop the raping process until the subject is satisfied, or if the victim escapes. (Part 1)
